Animation

School of Digital Arts

Echoes in the Abyss

A dreamlike animation that delves into the depths of the subconscious, where the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur. Created by SODA student, Luna Nightingale, this piece is an immersive journey into the unknown.

Digital Art

Faculty of Art and Design

The Cartography of the Soul

A digital art series that maps the inner landscapes of the human experience. SODA student, Astrid Starweaver, uses vibrant colors and intricate patterns to create a visual representation of the soul's journey. Each piece is a portal to a new dimension, inviting the viewer to explore the depths of their own psyche.

Film

School of Film and Media

The Memory of Water

A cinematic poem that explores the ephemeral nature of memory and the fluidity of time. SODA student, River Wynter, uses a combination of experimental techniques and lyrical storytelling to create a dreamlike atmosphere that transports the viewer to a world beyond the boundaries of reality.
